text: is a railway station operated by Nagoya Railroad located in Nishi-ku, Nagoya, Aichi, Japan. This station is unmanned. ==Lines== *Nagoya Railroad **Nagoya Main Line **Inuyama Line ==Layout== The station has two side platforms serving two tracks. ===Platforms=== ==Adjacent stations== ==See also== * ==References== ==External links== * Station guide Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1912 Category:Stations of Nagoya Railroad Category:Railway stations in Aichi Prefecture
title: Higashi-Biwajima Station
